title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, a group of teenagers piloting giant mechs must defend humanity against monstrous beings known as Angels.

title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
summary: A young man with a mysterious power leads a rebellion against a tyrannical empire, using giant mechs to wage war and achieve his goals.

title: Gurren Lagann
summary: A young man and his friends journey through a post-apocalyptic world, piloting giant robots to fight against powerful enemies.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans
summary: In a world of war and political intrigue, a group of orphans become mercenaries and fight for their survival using powerful mobile suits.

title: Eureka Seven
summary: A young boy joins a group of rebels, piloting a giant mech while uncovering secrets about the world and his connection to a mysterious girl.

title: Aldnoah.Zero
summary: A war breaks out between Earth and Martian colonies, where a young soldier must fight in massive mechs to protect humanity's future.

title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
summary: A group of rebels led by Simon and Kamina pilot a giant robot to fight against tyrannical forces, encountering powerful enemies and epic battles.

title: The 08th MS Team
summary: Set in the Universal Century timeline, this series follows a group of soldiers fighting in the Gundam universe, focusing on ground-level combat with mobile suits.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
summary: The final two episodes of the original Neon Genesis Evangelion series are re-imagined, culminating in an apocalyptic battle between humanity and the Angels.

title: Zoids: Chaotic Century
summary: In a world where giant mechanical animals called Zoids battle for supremacy, a young boy teams up with a mysterious girl to discover the truth behind a legendary Zoid.
